70/** Method used when retrieving a attribute value*/
71UENUM()
72enum class ECustomBoneAttributeLookup : uint8
73{
74 /** Only look for the attribute using the provided bone (name) */
75 BoneOnly,
76 /** Look for the attribute using the provided bone (name) and its direct parent bone */
77 ImmediateParent,
78 /** Look for the attribute using the provided bone (name) and its direct bone parent hierarchy up and until the root bone */
79 ParentHierarchy
80};
81
82struct FAnimationEvaluationContext
83{
84 // The anim instance we are evaluating
85 UAnimInstance* AnimInstance;
86
87 // The post process instance we are evaluating
88 UAnimInstance* PostProcessAnimInstance;
89
90 // The SkeletalMesh we are evaluating for
91 USkeletalMesh* SkeletalMesh;
92
93 // Evaluation data, swapped in from the component when we are running parallel eval
94 TArray<FTransform> ComponentSpaceTransforms;
95 TArray<FTransform> BoneSpaceTransforms;
96 TArray<FTransform> CachedComponentSpaceTransforms;
97 TArray<FTransform> CachedBoneSpaceTransforms;
98 FVector RootBoneTranslation;
99
100 // Are we performing interpolation this tick
101 bool bDoInterpolation;
102
103 // Are we evaluating this tick
104 bool bDoEvaluation;
105
106 // Are we storing data in cache bones this tick
107 bool bDuplicateToCacheBones;
108
109 // duplicate the cache curves
110 bool bDuplicateToCacheCurve;
111
112 // duplicate the cached attributes
113 bool bDuplicateToCachedAttributes;
114
115 // Force reference pose
116 bool bForceRefPose;
117
118 // Curve data, swapped in from the component when we are running parallel eval
119 FBlendedHeapCurve Curve;
120 FBlendedHeapCurve CachedCurve;
121
122 // attribute data, swapped in from the component when we are running parallel eval
123 UE::Anim::FMeshAttributeContainer CustomAttributes;
124 UE::Anim::FMeshAttributeContainer CachedCustomAttributes;
125
126 FAnimationEvaluationContext()
127 {
128 Clear();
129 }
130
131 void Copy(const FAnimationEvaluationContext& Other)
132 {
133 AnimInstance = Other.AnimInstance;
134 PostProcessAnimInstance = Other.PostProcessAnimInstance;
135 SkeletalMesh = Other.SkeletalMesh;
136 ComponentSpaceTransforms.Reset();
137 ComponentSpaceTransforms.Append(Other.ComponentSpaceTransforms);
138 BoneSpaceTransforms.Reset();
139 BoneSpaceTransforms.Append(Other.BoneSpaceTransforms);
140 CachedComponentSpaceTransforms.Reset();
141 CachedComponentSpaceTransforms.Append(Other.CachedComponentSpaceTransforms);
142 CachedBoneSpaceTransforms.Reset();
143 CachedBoneSpaceTransforms.Append(Other.CachedBoneSpaceTransforms);
144 RootBoneTranslation = Other.RootBoneTranslation;
145 Curve.CopyFrom(Other.Curve);
146 CachedCurve.CopyFrom(Other.CachedCurve);
147 bDoInterpolation = Other.bDoInterpolation;
148 bDoEvaluation = Other.bDoEvaluation;
149 bDuplicateToCacheBones = Other.bDuplicateToCacheBones;
150 bDuplicateToCacheCurve = Other.bDuplicateToCacheCurve;
151 bDuplicateToCachedAttributes = Other.bDuplicateToCachedAttributes;
152 bForceRefPose = Other.bForceRefPose;
153
154 CustomAttributes.CopyFrom(Other.CustomAttributes);
155 CachedCustomAttributes.CopyFrom(Other.CachedCustomAttributes);
156 }
157
158 void Clear()
159 {
160 AnimInstance = nullptr;
161 PostProcessAnimInstance = nullptr;
162 SkeletalMesh = nullptr;
163 }
164
165};
166
167/** This enum defines how you'd like to update bones to physics world.
168 If bone is simulating, you don't have to waste time on updating bone transform from kinematic.
169 But also sometimes you don't like fixed bones to be updated by animation data. */
170UENUM()
171namespace EKinematicBonesUpdateToPhysics
172{
173 enum Type : int
174 {
175 /** Update any bones that are not simulating. */
176 SkipSimulatingBones,
177 /** Skip physics update from kinematic changes. */
178 SkipAllBones
179 };
180}

189 // This is custom type, engine leaves AnimInstance as it is
190 AnimationCustomMode UMETA(DisplayName = "Use Custom Mode"),
191 };
192}

195namespace EPhysicsTransformUpdateMode

197 enum Type : int
198 {
199 SimulationUpatesComponentTransform UMETA(DisplayName="Simulation Updates Component Transform"),
200 ComponentTransformIsKinematic
201 };
202}

211/**
212* Tick function that does post physics work on skeletal mesh component. This executes in EndPhysics (after physics is done)
213**/
214USTRUCT()
215struct FSkeletalMeshComponentEndPhysicsTickFunction : public FTickFunction
216{
217 GENERATED_USTRUCT_BODY()
218
219 USkeletalMeshComponent* Target;
220
221 /**
222 * Abstract function to execute the tick.
223 * @param DeltaTime - frame time to advance, in seconds.
224 * @param TickType - kind of tick for this frame.
225 * @param CurrentThread - thread we are executing on, useful to pass along as new tasks are created.
226 * @param MyCompletionGraphEvent - completion event for this task. Useful for holding the completetion of this task until certain child tasks are complete.
227 */
228 virtual void ExecuteTick(float DeltaTime, enum ELevelTick TickType, ENamedThreads::Type CurrentThread, const FGraphEventRef& MyCompletionGraphEvent) override;
229 /** Abstract function to describe this tick. Used to print messages about illegal cycles in the dependency graph. */
230 virtual FString DiagnosticMessage() override;
231 /** Function used to describe this tick for active tick reporting. **/
232 virtual FName DiagnosticContext(bool bDetailed) override;
233};
234
235template<>
236struct TStructOpsTypeTraits<FSkeletalMeshComponentEndPhysicsTickFunction> : public TStructOpsTypeTraitsBase2<FSkeletalMeshComponentEndPhysicsTickFunction>
237{
238 enum
239 {
240 WithCopy = false
241 };
242};
243
244
245/**
246* Tick function that prepares and simulates cloth
247**/
248USTRUCT()
249struct FSkeletalMeshComponentClothTickFunction : public FTickFunction
250{
251 GENERATED_USTRUCT_BODY()
252
253 USkeletalMeshComponent* Target;
254
255 /**
256 * Abstract function to execute the tick.
257 * @param DeltaTime - frame time to advance, in seconds.
258 * @param TickType - kind of tick for this frame.
259 * @param CurrentThread - thread we are executing on, useful to pass along as new tasks are created.
260 * @param MyCompletionGraphEvent - completion event for this task. Useful for holding the completetion of this task until certain child tasks are complete.
261 */
262 virtual void ExecuteTick(float DeltaTime, enum ELevelTick TickType, ENamedThreads::Type CurrentThread, const FGraphEventRef& MyCompletionGraphEvent) override;
263 /** Abstract function to describe this tick. Used to print messages about illegal cycles in the dependency graph. */
264 virtual FString DiagnosticMessage() override;
265 /** Function used to describe this tick for active tick reporting. **/
266 virtual FName DiagnosticContext(bool bDetailed) override;
267};
268
269template<>
270struct TStructOpsTypeTraits<FSkeletalMeshComponentClothTickFunction> : public TStructOpsTypeTraitsBase2<FSkeletalMeshComponentClothTickFunction>
271{
272 enum
273 {
274 WithCopy = false
275 };
276};

279struct FClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset
280{
281 /** The closest point in world space */
282 FVector ClosestWorldPosition;
283
284 /** The normal associated with the surface of the closest body */
285 FVector Normal;
286
287 /** The name of the bone associated with the closest body */
288 FName BoneName;
289
290 /** The distance of the closest point and the original world position. 0 Indicates world position is inside the closest body. */
291 float Distance;
292
293 FClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset()
294 : ClosestWorldPosition(FVector::ZeroVector)
295 , Normal(FVector::ZeroVector)
296 , BoneName(NAME_None)
297 , Distance(-1.f)
298 {
299 }
300};

954 struct FPendingRadialForces

957 {
958 AddImpulse,
959 AddForce
960 };
961

963 float Radius;
964 float Strength;
965 ERadialImpulseFalloff Falloff;
966 bool bIgnoreMass;
967 EType Type;
968 int32 FrameNum;
969
970 FPendingRadialForces(FVector InOrigin, float InRadius, float InStrength, ERadialImpulseFalloff InFalloff, bool InIgnoreMass, EType InType)
971 : Origin(InOrigin)
972 , Radius(InRadius)
973 , Strength(InStrength)
974 , Falloff(InFalloff)
975 , bIgnoreMass(InIgnoreMass)
976 , Type(InType)
977 , FrameNum(GFrameNumber)
978 {
979 }
980 };

1154 /* Animation play functions
1155 *
1156 * These changes status of animation instance, which is transient data, which means it won't serialize with this component
1157 * Because of that reason, it is not safe to be used during construction script
1158 * Please use OverrideAnimationData for construction script. That will override AnimationData to be serialized
1159 */

1913 /**
1914 * Given a world position, find the closest point on the physics asset. Note that this is independent of collision and welding. This is based purely on animation position
1915 * @param WorldPosition The point we want the closest point to (i.e. for all bodies in the physics asset, find the one that has a point closest to WorldPosition)
1916 * @param ClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset The data associated with the closest point (position, normal, etc...)
1917 * @param bApproximate The closest body is found using bone transform distance instead of body distance. This approximation means the final point is the closest point on a potentially not closest body. This approximation gets worse as the size of Bodies gets bigger.
1918 * @return true if we found a closest point
1919 */
1920 ENGINE_API bool GetClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset(const FVector& WorldPosition, FClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset& ClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset, bool bApproximate) const;
1921

1923 * Given a world position, find the closest point on the physics asset. Note that this is independent of collision and welding. This is based purely on animation position
1924 * @param WorldPosition The point we want the closest point to (i.e. for all bodies in the physics asset, find the one that has a point closest to WorldPosition)
1925 * @param ClosestPointOnPhysicsAsset The data associated with the closest point (position, normal, etc...)
1926 * @return true if we found a closest point
1927 */

2813struct FLinkedInstancesAdapter
2814{
2815 static void AddLinkedInstance(USkeletalMeshComponent* InComponent, UAnimInstance* InAnimInstance)
2816 {
2817 if (InComponent && InAnimInstance)
2818 {
2819 InComponent->LinkedInstances.AddUnique(InAnimInstance);
2820 }
2821 }
2822
2823 static void RemoveLinkedInstance(USkeletalMeshComponent* InComponent, UAnimInstance* InAnimInstance)
2824 {
2825 if (InComponent && InAnimInstance)
2826 {
2827 InComponent->LinkedInstances.Remove(InAnimInstance);
2828 }
2829 }
2830
2831 static void ResetLinkedInstance(USkeletalMeshComponent* InComponent)
2832 {
2833 if (InComponent)
2834 {
2835 InComponent->LinkedInstances.Reset();
2836 }
2837 }
2838};
